name: Grand Theft Auto V 3D Character Model
summary: A YDD file is a 3D model used in Grand Theft Auto V, an open-world action-adventure game published by Rockstar Games. It contains a character feature, such as a head, facial feature, hair, or article of clothing. YDD files are similar to .YDR files, which contain Grand Theft Auto V 3D objects.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: AutoDesk 3DS Max with GIMS Evo plug-in installed
Rockstar Games Grand Theft Auto V
